satisfaction.label: How did this process go for you?

easy.label: According to the following answers, what suits you best:

options.label: The process was easy to complete
The process was neither easy nor difficult to complete
The process was difficult to complete

comprehension.label: What did you think of the language used?

options.label: Unclear, difficult to understand
Neither easy nor difficult to understand
Clear, easy to understand
No, I did not encounter any difficulties
Yes, I lacked information before starting the process
Yes, the process did not work
Yes, the site did not display well on mobile
Yes, I had difficulty attaching documents
Yes, there was a lack of information about the follow-up to my request or process (timeframe, etc.)
Other

difficulties_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other difficulties you encountered?

contact.label: Did you try to contact the process service for help?

options.label: No, I did not need to contact them
Yes, but I did not find how to contact them
Yes, I contacted them but could not reach them
Yes, I contacted them and they responded to me

contact_satisfaction.label: How was the interaction with the process service?

contact_channels.label: By what means did you try to contact the process service? (multiple answers possible)

options.label: Phone
Email or messaging
Agency or counter
Other

help.label: Did you need any other help to complete this process?

options.label: No, I completed it without assistance
Yes, I searched the internet (site, forum)
Yes, I asked for help from a family member or friend
Yes, I asked for help from an association
Other

help_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other help you needed?

verbatim.label: Would you like to tell us more?
verbatim.hint: Do not provide any personal information here. This is not a contact form. If you have questions about this process, contact the relevant service.
